title: WeChat usage frequency in the United States 2018
summary: This chart shows the Share of respondents conducted by frequency in a United States .
\\n From the chart we see that the Once_every_few_days Response was the WeChat usage Response in the States with 87 respondents .
The next Response to make the most respondents was the Once_a_week Response with 2 respondents closely followed by Never with 87 respondents .

data.Response: Less often than every few weeks

gold: This statistic presents the frequency of WeChat usage in the United States as of January 2018 . During an online survey conducted by We Are Flint , it was found that two percent of internet users in the United States accessed the messenger app once every few days .
